library(FlickrAPI)
library(pixture)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(here::i_am("lgrs/Trieste.qmd"))
file_name <- here::here("data","flickr-photos.rds")
all_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)

seleccion <- c("Insomnia01", "Insomnia02", "Insomnia03")

photos <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% slice_sample()

paths <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% pull(url_m)
captions <- all_photos %>% filter(title %in% seleccion) %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong> by <a href='https://www.flickr.com/photos/jferrer/%s' target='flickr'>JR Ferrer Paris @ flickr</a>",title,id)) %>% pull()

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)
